item.title: This last weekend, I was freezing to death in Madrid
item.dc:creator: Xavier Damman
item.content:encoded: Have you seen that? Incredible isn't it? I've got two hypotheses to explain this: 1- It was really that cold 2- That temperature indicator is powered by Windows Vista Which one is the more possible according to you? What do you think?
item.excerpt:encoded: Have you seen that? Incredible isn't it? I've got two hypotheses to explain this: 1- It was really that cold 2- That temperature indicator is powered by Windows Vista Which one is the more possible according to you? What do you think?
